attributes.action: Getting the Politicians on the same Pensions deal as Public sector workers
attributes.additional_details: Why should politicians be immune to the 'we are all in this together' attitude. I believe Politicians should be made to live with the same Pension changes as the 'ordinary' worker - what makes them exempt? So shouldn't the Politicans be made to fall into line and fall under the exact same Pension rules that lots of people are striking against?
